welcome_message_body: "Welcome to St. Anthony, where quaint charm meets breathtaking nature. Known for its stunning landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore our town and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Flying Cloud Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Flying Cloud Airport is used exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Crystal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Crystal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Anoka County-Blaine Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Anoka County-Blaine Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Downtown Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
